import java.util.*;
public class Solution
{
    public static void main(String args[])
    {
        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
        int n = sc.nextInt();
        long A[] = new long[n];
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
            A[i] = sc.nextLong();
        long min = Long.MAX_VALUE;
        long current = 0;
        long prev = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
        {
            current = prev / A[i] + 1;
            prev = (prev / A[i] + 1) * A[i];
        }
        min = Math.min(min, current);
        System.out.println(min);
    }
}
